name: Necron's Ladder
lore:
&8Consumable

&7&7While in your inventory, counts the
&7number of &6Necron's Handles &7that
&7you obtain from Dungeon Chests&7.

&7If you obtain &a3 &7handles you can
&7consume this item to permanently gain:
&7 &c+1❤ Health
&7 &b+1✎ Intelligence
&7 &b+1✯ Magic Find

&7Handles obtained: &a0&7/&c3

&8You may only gain this bonus once!

&9&lRARE&r
